name: DABDConnect
0:
”Alexa, turn on power shower”
”Alexa, turn off power shower”
”Alexa, turn on sleep comfort”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill allows the integration of the "DConnect Box" or "DConnect Ready" product with Alexa.

To take advantage of the Comfort and Economy modes of the DAB DConnect products via Alexa, you must:
- Download the "DAB DConnect" application available for IOs and Android,
- Create an account and register the product on the DAB Cloud via the application itself.

A list of Alexa Commands available:
- "Alexa, turn on power shower" : You can temporarily increase the pressure of your system and you can enjoy your bath!
- "Alexa, turn on sleep comfort": You can reduce your Energy Consuption and water run-off decreasing the pressure of your system during a specific time slot.
- "Alexa, turn off power shower/sleep comfort": Reset your pump to standard settings.

NOTE:
 - A "DConnect Box" or "DConnect Ready" product is required to use this skill. More information and assistance at www.internetofpumps.com
- To be able to use the service, the "DConnect Box" or "DConnect Ready" product must be placed in a place covered by a good internet connection and a good WiFi signal or wired LAN.
- Only your DConnect Cloud DAB account can be linked to this skill.
